function.name: check_calendar_availability
function.description: Checks if a specific date and time slot is available for a consultation appointment in the calendar. Always use this function BEFORE booking an appointment to verify availability. The function will tell you if the requested time is available or not.

requestedDate.description: The date for the appointment in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g., '2025-11-10' or natural format like 'November 10, 2025'

requestedTime.description: The time for the appointment in 24-hour format like '14:00' or 12-hour format like '2:00 PM'

timezone.description: Timezone for the appointment. Default is 'Europe/London'. Use 'Asia/Dubai' for Dubai appointments.
